mapper.insert: insert into qa (qa_no, user_no, qa_content, qa_title, qa_image) values (qa_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{content}, #{title}, #{image})
mapper.select: select qa_no as no, qa_content as content, qa_title as title, qa_image as image from qa order by qa_no = #{no}
